title: The Sapphires
creator_credit: Wayne Blair, Tony Briggs, Keith Thompson, Rosemary Blight, Melinda Doring, Gordon Westman, Goalpost Pictures and Kylie du Fresne
brief_description: It’s 1968, and four young, talented Australian Aboriginal girls learn about love, friendship and war when they entertain the US troops in Vietnam as singing group The Sapphires.

constellations_other.name: Setting the record straight
constellations_other.description: For too long, the history of Australia was only told in mainstream films through a white lens. First Nations people have used the camera as a means of truth-telling and setting the record straight for decades.

constellations_other.name: Sequins and sapphires
constellations_other.description: Two of the most striking costumes on the big and small screens embody the glamour of leading First Peoples ladies.

constellations_other.name: Rachel Perkins
constellations_other.description: The moving image has helped tell First Peoples stories through documentary, films and TV shows, with acclaimed director, producer and screenwriter Rachel Perkins contributing significantly to these stories.

creator_credit_for_label: Wayne Blair, Tony Briggs, Keith Thompson, Rosemary Blight, Melinda Doring, Gordon Westman, Goalpost Pictures and Kylie du Fresne
description: It’s 1968, and four young, talented Australian Aboriginal girls learn about love, friendship and war when they entertain the US troops in Vietnam as singing group The Sapphires.
